name: Don't Fear The Monsters In Your Closet
name_original: Don't Fear The Monsters In Your Closet
description:
DON'T FEAR THE MONSTERS IN YOUR CLOSET!!!

If you do, your scare-o-meter will get full, and YOU will get a heart attack!!!!

(i made this game in like 4-5 hours so dont expect too much in the first build)

press enter to pause, and try to figure out what the 2 monsters' mechanics are

the game includes:

the eye

the four legged

really scarty spooks

and more (not much mor)e
